posts.post_content: I know that these are fairly common cards that are not hard to come by but I thought I would post here first. I am looking for good to vg/ex condition T206 Al Shaw, Hunky Shaw, Snodgrass and Marquard Hands at Thighs, back damage is okay since I just need a decent front. You can PM or email me scans and price at [URL="andrewhahn55@gmail.com"]andrewhahn55@gmail.com[/URL]  Thanks
